message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product. I think you'll really appreciate its value. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20,000. What do you think?
Alice,  $20,000 is significantly higher than my budget.  I'm really interested in this product, but I can only offer $10,000.  Let me know if that's something we can work with.

Bob, I understand you're on a tight budget, but I have to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $16,000. This is the lowest I can go, but I think it's a fair price considering the product's value.
